correction_response:
This tweet is misleading. The Biden administration did not willingly leave Paul Whelan behind. They have been actively working to secure his release, as stated by U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken. The choice was to bring home Brittney Griner or no one at all, due to Russia's insistence on treating Whelan's case differently. The administration continues to work on securing Whelan's release. The prisoner swap involving Viktor Bout, the "Merchant of Death", was a complex negotiation and not a simple handover. 
https://www.reuters.com/world/biden-says-not-giving-up-securing-paul-whelan-release-2022-12-08/
https://www.reuters.com/world/us-basketball-star-griner-released-russian-custody-prisoner-swap-us-official-2022-12-08/
https://www.reuters.com/world/us-ex-marine-whelan-still-russian-custody-swap-talks-continue-lawyer-cited-by-2022-12-08/
note_1_text: “Sadly and for totally illegitimate reasons, Russia is treating Paul's case differently than Brittney's. And while we have not yet succeeded in securing Paul's release, we are not giving up," Biden said.  https://www.reuters.com/world/biden-says-not-giving-up-securing-paul-whelan-release-2022-12-08/
note_2_text: Rep. Boebert is referring to Paul Whelan who was arrested in late 2018 in Russia for allegedly spying. In 2008, he was court-martialed and discharged from the Marines for bad conduct. It's worth noting that Mr. Whelan was born in Canada & holds citizenship in four countries.    https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/2022/12/08/who-is-paul-whelan/
queries:
1. Did Biden give Putin back a criminal known as the "Merchant of Death"?
2. Who is Paul Whelan and why was he left behind by Biden?
3. Comparison between Biden's handling of Paul Whelan case and "Merchant of Death" case.
